title: Tell Me You Started to Pray
lyrics:
You tell me, you've started, praying all the time and you keep me on your mind
When traffic is slow and the dead rain hits the window
I am sorry to say, it is taking time just to get it right
It is easy to see, when my walls are up, I can know no luck
Won't you wait? Baby, won't you wait?



You tell me, you've started, searching for a meaning in words that I've been speaking

And barely getting through, there is still so much I wanna say to you

You show me, I could be poison free, and I now believe in the beauty of a thorn

Sinking in as the blood is drawn



Won't you wait? Baby, won't you wait?



I'm over the hillside like every day

How many times can I say?

I promise tomorrow I'm turning the page

I see why you started to pray



Wait, wait, wait, wait

Baby, won't you wait?
